summary:
CA: 0x11c13F1863b760576457F2cc4214d780fC87232b - ZealBet ($ZEAL) At ZealBet, we are more than just a crypto token – we’re a movement that’s redefining the way you experience gaming and giving. With an air of mystery and an undertone of purpose, ZealBet combines the thrill of responsible gambling with the power of philanthropy. Our platform offers a safe haven for those who seek the excitement of gaming while advocating for responsible play.

 Tokenomics of $ZEAL - Name: ZealBet
Total Supply: 100,000,000
Tax System: 8% Buy, 8% Sell

Immerse yourself in the ZealBet universe with our native token, ZEAL. With a total supply of 100 million, ZealBet encapsulates gaming passion and meaningful contributions.

When you engage with ZEAL, an 8% fee is applied. Out of this, 2% strengthens the liquidity pool, enhancing stability. A further 5% empowers vibrant marketing strategies, while 1% supports the visionary developers.

ZealBet is not just a token; it’s an invitation to embark on a journey of responsible gaming and purpose-driven influence. Embrace the excitement and make your impact felt today!

 Token Allocation - The $ZEAL token distribution strategy is designed to ensure the project’s longevity and continuous growth. The allocation of the total supply of ZEAL tokens is divided strategically to support the optimal development, promotion, and operation of the project. The distribution is as follows:



Pancake Swap

70% of the tokens are allocated to Pancake Swap.



Marketing

10% of the tokens are allocated to Marketing.



Partnerships

We will reserve 10% of the tokens for strategic partnerships.



Whitelist

10% of the tokens will be allocated to the whitelist for staking and other ventures.

 Roadmap - Website and Social Media

Safu Contract Creation

Continued Major Partnerships

Listing on Top Exchanges

Special Grand Giveaway

Creating Zeal Card

Worldwide Poker Tournament Online

Continued Donations Campaigns

Pragmatic Gaming Integration

Hacksaw Gaming Integration

 How to Buy & Sell - Step 1.

Go to your DApp inside your wallet.



Step 2.

Select the Mainnet of BNB Chain.



Step 3.

Click on Cake and paste the Contract Address into the search bar.



Step 4.

Enter the amount of BNB you wish to exchange for your $ZEAL coins.

Note: As the tax is 8%, please set your slippage at around 10%, and remember to connect your wallet via the Connect Wallet button.
